front.title: Problem statement of key distribution for 802.11r using CAPWAP protocol

abstract.t: CAPWAP specifies a communication exchange mechanism between Wireless Termination Points (WTPs) and a centralized Access Controller (AC) to assist in better coordination and control across the entire ESS network. However it does not specify how to distribute keys used in 802.11r. This document focuses on the requirement for 802.11r key distribution using CAPWAP protocol.
